channel.title: Quantum - Better Content This Time
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg405/scaled.php?server=405&filename=quantumancient.png&res=landing[/img]
[b]Well, here is Quantum... again. I try to make the content customized, but I still like to have some of RuneScape's content as well. I will be looking for another developer, I'll put the form at the button.[/b]
Here is my old forums I used a while ago, I was thinking of using it again. [url=http://quantum.net78.net/]Quantum Community[/url]
[size=4][b]Base: Dementhium 637[/b][/size]
[size=4][b]Current Staff:[/b][/size] [b]Moderators: None
Administrators: None
Programmers: 2/2 *Wildskiller *Fails
Gfx Designers: 0/1[/b]
[b]Everything (and more) in the pictures were written and re-written by me.[/b]
[code=Development Log] July 18, 2012 - Redid Slayer system July 18, 2012 - Added slayer rewards July 23, 2012 - Added Guthix Wizards Combat files July 24, 2012 - Fixed TurnTo action for magic July 24, 2012 - Fixed Hand cannon special July 24, 2012 - Added Cure Me spell for lunars July 24, 2012 - Added wilderness looting system July 25, 2012 - Added Boss kills and Quest points July 25, 2012 - Added cow milking July 25, 2012 - Added Sheep shearing July 25, 2012 - Added Wheat and Flax picking July 26, 2012 - Tome of frost now replaces water runes July 26, 2012 - Fixed the castle wars teleport out glitch and when you win a game, your rewarded tickets July 26, 2012 - Added More mining spots July 26, 2012 - Added TzTok-Jad with correct delays and healers July 26, 2012 - Added 2 Worlds July 27, 2012 - Stopped working on the source for the day July 28, 2012 - Added Spinning for the crafting skill July 28, 2012 - Nests and gems can now be obtained randomly from mining/wc July 28, 2012 - Fixed door manager July 28, 2012 - Lachtoper now offers jobs July 29, 2012 - Removed entire Barrows Mini-game (I will Re-write) July 29, 2012 - Added Barrows Brother combat actions July 30, 2012 - Added Sergeant Sambur at barb course for agile armor July 30, 2012 - Removed most of the npcs from Lumbridge (To start again) July 30, 2012 - Fixed currency issue with the shop currency config July 30, 2012 - Fixed Mandrith and Nastroth July 30, 2012 - Fixed spinning dupe I created July 30, 2012 - Worked on Corporeal beast and NecroLord July 30, 2012 - Worked on Farming, and now there is a class almost complete for it July 30, 2012 - Added Dungeoneering floor generator July 31, 2012 - Added some new materials in cooking July 31, 2012 - Highered the exp rate July 31, 2012 - Added Cook's Assistant Quest July 31, 2012 - Added Dungeon Tokens (Dungeoneering Tokens) July 31, 2012 - Added Warriors Guild Mini-game July 31, 2012 - Added saving for warrior guild tokens and fixed doors July 31, 2012 - Added barrows chest reward and fixed the doors July 31, 2012 - Guthan and Dharok now use vengeance (Just to make them harder) August 1, 2012 - Added Warrior guild token decreasing and added cyclops August 2, 2012 - Fixed the weapon attack animations (Some weren't right) August 2, 2012 - Added Guthan armor set ability August 3, 2012 - Added a 20% chance to lose an arrow instead of it going onto the ground every time August 3, 2012 - Redid the Quest handler (Mine) August 4, 2012 - Fixed some spinning errors I created August 4, 2012 - Added Desert Treasure Quest August 4, 2012 - Re-arranged Lumbridge August 5, 2012 - Added Chest Thieving August 5, 2012 - Added Living rock cave fishing, Living rock NPC files August 5, 2012 - Added Living mineral mining August 5, 2012 - Added Slayer Monster requirements such as rock hammer for Gargoyles, salt for slugs, a shield for Basilisks, ect. August 6, 2012 - Made woodcutting a bit... better August 6, 2012 - You can now get mobilising armies titles when you kill certain amounts of players August 6, 2012 - You can forge 5 black d'leather and 2 void dust to make void leather for void armor crafting August 7, 2012 - Fixed Nex's wrath errors August 7, 2012 - Added Restless Ghost quest August 9, 2012 - Added a Lottery September 8, 2012 - When wielding the Ring of wealth, you earn a +10% chance of getting better barrows loot and drop loot September 8, 2012 - Added a time handler that handles the players'/pets' time online September 8, 2012 - You get a +1% chance added to your barrows loot for every 10 npcs you kill in the tunnels September 8, 2012 - Added Dwarf Multicannon base, I only need to make the cannon directions correctly, right now I just code=javad it a shitty way September 8, 2012 - Worked on the spell book and other interfaces for dungeoneering September 8, 2012 - Perfected Barrows September 8, 2012 - Added Lamp Handler that controls the experience you gain depending on the lamp September 8, 2012 - Made my PvP Drops system better September 10, 2012 - Added Stealing Creations Base [/code]
[b][size=6]Media[/size][/b]
[b][size=4]Spinning; Crafting. And no, those aren't the only materials you can spin[/size][/b] [IMG]http://img507.imageshack.us/img507/1706/crafting.png[/img]
[b][size=4]Stealing Creations[/size][/b] [IMG]http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/5955/stealingcreationlobby.png[/img]
[b][size=4]Barrows[/size][/b] [IMG]http://img844.imageshack.us/img844/2602/ahrim.png[/img]
[b][size=4]Void Leather Forging[/size][/b] [IMG]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/7522/voidleatherforging.png[/img]
[b][size=4]Void Leather Armour Making[/size][/b] [IMG]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/9681/voidcrafting.png[/img]
[b][size=4]Time Handler[/size][/b] [IMG]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/3627/timeonline.png[/img]
[b][size=4]Dungeoneering[/size][/b] [IMG]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/4265/dungeoneerings.png[/img]
[b][size=4]Warriors Guild[/size][/b] [IMG]http://img690.imageshack.us/img690/922/cyclopsk.png[/img]
[b][size=4]Flax Picking[/size][/b] [IMG]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/9190/flaxpicking.png[/img]
[b][size=4]TzTok-Jad[/size][/b] [IMG]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/7461/jadf.png[/img]
[b][size=4]Lachtopher Jobs (I changed the dialogue so it wouldn't look unprofessional[/size][/b] [IMG]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/3971/lachtoperjobs.png[/img]
[b][size=4]Sheep Shearing[/size][/b] [IMG]http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/7736/shearing.png[/img]
[b][size=4]Wheat Picking[/size][/b] [IMG]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/1443/wheatpicking.png[/img]
[b][size=4]Tree Nests[/size][/b] [IMG]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/938/snesto.png[/img]
[b][size=4]Castle Wars Shop[/size][/b] [IMG]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/4504/castlewarsinterface.png[/img]
[b][size=4]Corporeal Beast[/size][/b] [IMG]http://img195.imageshack.us/img195/8536/corpcu.png[/img]
[b][size=4]Random Events[/size][/b] [img]http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/1862/freakyforrester.png[/img]
[b][size=4]Quantum Support Banner[/size][/b] [IMG]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg337/scaled.php?server=337&filename=supportancient.png&res=landing[/img] [code]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg337/scaled.php?server=337&filename=supportancient.png&res=landing[/code]
[b]What is my goal?[/b] Just to have a more customized and entertaining server.
[size=3][b]Application Form (Programmer):[/b][/size] [code=Application Form] Name: Age: Programming Experience (Years): Time you can work: MSN:
Not Required: Why do you want to program for Quantum? Do you have any proof of your work?[/code]
[size=3][b]Application Form (Gfx Designer):[/b][/size] [code=Application Form] Name: Age: Gfx Designing Experience (Years): MSN: Proof of work: [/code] [/center]

item.title: Quantum - Better Content This Time
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

Added barbarian fishing. I don’t do a lot of updates because I get bored after I add something lol

Whenever I write a skill, I write my own formulas as well.

item.title: Quantum - Better Content This Time
item.dc:creator: @VideoEditorMilo VideoEditorMilo
item.description:
@VideoEditorMilo wrote:

You should combine Blacksmithing, Crafting, Fletching, and all of the “item on item” skills together and create a skill called, “Creation”, where you would have to use your imagination and the process of trial and error to combine different items/ ingredients together in order to create completely new items and/or ingredients. It would be cool if there was over hundreds and hundreds of combinations where some would lead to failures such as: ashes, bones etc. and other combinations would lead to discoveries such as: armor, weapons, pots, keys (that lead to random chests all over the world) etc. Of course if people found out how to create godswords or claws or whatever is considered as a rare in your server, you would have to make the items used for the creation of those weapons harder to obtain. This idea would work much better with custom items because then there would be much more combinations and mystery as to what item can be created from what combination. People should also be aware that if they combine rare items together, they won’t necessarily succeed in creating an even rarer item, for example: Dragon Chainbody + Dragon Bones = scrap metal or something like that. I think a server revolving around something like this would be much more fun to play. It would make people curious. Anyways, you can obviously expand on this…it’s just something that I think would be cool to consider. Good luck with the development :o

Read full topic

item.title: Quantum - Better Content This Time
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:11, topic:459416”][quote author=wildskiller link=topic=562321.msg4100261#msg4100261 date=1347372940]

Looks brilliant, wildskiller.

Is stealing creation 100%?

No, I’ve got to understand the region builder and then add the object actions. The interfaces, configs, and shop are done though.

Ah, I see :P.

Will you be releasing it or hosting it?

I don’t have money or have any way of getting any, so I’ll have to find someone to help out.
[/quote]

Why don’t you come back to helix and we will use this base? There’s an easy 75 players at least and I have a domain/vps.

Just a thought.[/quote]

Alright.
